name: The Browning African Safari: Trail to the Big 5 Deluxe
name_original: The Browning African Safari: Trail to the Big 5 Deluxe
description:
The Browning African Safari: Trail to the Big 5 Deluxe is a sports game developed by Oquirrh Productions.
The Browning African Safari: Trail to the Big 5 Deluxe is available on PC.
